Posts.Content:
So, Mary K -- you found me! LOL!! NKPA62 is my screen name everywhere I go. If I had another one, I would forget who I am! LOL!! 
I read through the roll call posts and recognized so many names! 
I don't live in Burton anymore. I live in downtown Flint now. If I ever got to Florida, I don't think I would have ever come back to Flint. But, I can't do that--I have family here. And, BTW--I have a 2 year old granddaughter! I have to see Codi grow!!
I moved into a senior living apartment complex about
 3 years ago, and it was the best move I could have made for myself. There are a lot of wonderful people here, and when they found out what happened to me, they got together and prayed for me. 
I posted at the end of the roll-call posts and explained what happened--most of what I sent you in email, MK. 
Tavish? Lori--did you used to be Lori2000??
Gail--it's great to see you again. 
MNLady13 I am hoping the new drugs can do it for me. I won't know until at least Monday if I have to have chemo--depends on the scans I am having done. I can have a 6 month mamm now, too.
I remember you too, Bev.
Deb, I don't believe we have met. 
I thank all of you for your prayers. 
Love and hugs, Viv :)
PS--MK notice that I am listening to you--I am not worrying about
 the tests. I am taking notes to talk to my chemo onc on Monday, but I am not going to worry until I have something to worry about
. 
The rad treatments--I have 3 left (of 20) and they helped me get back my walking and talking skills, which the dr said would happen--and it was almost right away. I thank God for that. I'm praying the rest of the rads took care of the 6 lesions and will have an MRI next week after rads are over. I don't remember as well as I did a few months ago, but I can live with it. Another reason/excuse for chemobrain--or just being blonde!
Posts.Title: Some of you may remember Viv from the old hood.
ROLL CALL name, age, state and any other info to share
